name: Traveling Light
effect: Roll +1 die during Travel Rolls. You are unencumbered, which may make it easier to climb, swim, or other activities where a lighter load would help.

name: Unencumbered
effect: Gain +1 _Movement_.

name: Traveling Heavy
effect: Add an additional <u>Fatigue</u> Danger while traveling. You are heavily encumbered, which may make it harder to climb, swim, or other activities where a lighter load would help.

name: Heavily Encumbered
effect: Gain -1 _Movement_.

name: Accelerate
effect: Gain 1 _Movement_.

name: Spiritcraft
effect: _Prepare_ X _Momentum_ on any Spirit Ability. If you are at a Place of Power, instead _Prepare_ X+1. A Spirit may always use this Maneuver, regardless of their current Stance.

name: Concentrate
effect: Gain _Concentrating_.

name: Manipulate
effect:
You attempt to manipulate a creature with body language, shouts, or basic insults. Choose one:
* <u>Confuse:</u> The Target must _Negate_ [7 _Focus_] or gain 1 _Stun_ and your choice of _Impaired_/_Exposed_.
* <u>Taunt:</u> The Target must _Negate_ [7 _Focus_] or gain _Taunted_. If you are _Engaged_, increase the DC by 1.
* <u>Startle:</u> The Target must _Negate_ [6 _Focus_] or lose 1 _Movement_.

enhancements.name: Bon Mot
enhancements.effect: Increase the Negate DC by 2. If you target a creature that speaks your language and craft an insult, instead increase it by 3.

name: Size Up
effect: The Target must _Negate_ [6 _Focus_] or gain _Studied_.

name: Envenom
prereqs: _Graze_+ with a _Natural_ Weapon and the Attack dealt at least 1 Damage.
effect: Add _Poisoned_ 2 to the Attack.

name: Disengage
effect: Do not create an [_Opening_] from spending this Movement.
special: If you are in a Mobility Stance this may instead have a cost of 1 _Momentum_.

name: Breather
effect: Clear 2 _Stun_. You may add [_Pacifist_] to instead clear 3 _Stun_ or _Recover_.

name: Counter
effect: Choose an Attack, adding [_Discount_ 2]. Automatically resolve that Attack as if it was a _Hit_ against the Attacker if they are in Range.

name: Delay
effect: Instead, act next _Phase_. You may not choose this if you already would be taking a _Turn_ next _Phase_ or if it is _Phase_ 6.

name: Perfect Parry
effect: The triggering Attack is _Glancing_. If you are in a _Defensive_ _Stance_ _Cost_ is instead None.

name: Perfect Dodge
effect: Gain 1 _Movement_ that may only be used for this _Gambit_. Immediately spend _Movement_ as if it was your turn. No _Movement_ spent in this way creates _Openings_.

name: Opportunity Attack
trigger: A creature you are _Engaged_ with creates an _Opening_.
effect: Use a Single-Target Attack [_Discount_ 2] against the triggering creature.

name: Lethal Strike
effect: Deal 4 _Bonus_ _Damage_. If this Defeats the Target, gain 1 _Momentum_.

name: Flurry
effect:
Choose one:
* Repeat the Attack, adding [_Discount_ 2, _Follow-Up_ ] and gaining a +1 _Bonus_ if it was _Light_.
* If you triggered this with an Attack from a _Wielded_ _Weapon_ and are _Wielding_ a second _Weapon_, Attack with the secondary Weapon, adding [_Discount_ 2] and gaining a +1 _Bonus_ if it was _Light_.

name: Staggering Impact
effect:
Choose one:
* Deal +2 _Stun_ and add _Staggered_ [_Focus_/_Grit_].
* Add _Sunder_ [_Reflex_]. If the Target _Blocks_, you must Target _Wielded_ Equipment if possible.

If the triggering Attack was _Heavy_, deal +2 _Stun_.

name: Sacrifice Armor
effect: Gain _Fatigue_ and reduce the _Durability_ of a _Worn_ piece of _Armor_ by 1. Reduce the severity of the _Wound_ by 1 (i.e. reduce a _Slash_ II _Wound_ to _Slash_ I). If you used a _Parry_ _Reaction_, you may instead reduce the _Durability_ of a _Wielded_ item. You may use this _Reaction_ multiple times against the same Trigger.
special: You may use this ability in narrative play when appropriate.

name: Return
effect: You immediately stop being _Manifested_ and return to your companion, granting them 1 _Momentum_. You may only use this Ability if you have done nothing else on your _Turn_, but may use it regardless of your current _Stance_.

name: Gain Advantage
effect: Gain 1 _Momentum_ or _Guard_.

name: Flank
trigger: A creature you are _Engaged_ with is Attacked by a creature other than you.
effect: The Attack gains a +1 _Bonus_ if _Melee_. Additionally, the Target has _Disadvantage_ on any _Defense Roll_ made against this Attack.

name: Spiritbound
effect:
You are bound to an elemental spirit, the source of your magic and a constant companion from your youth. It has a distinct personality and is capable of independent thought and action, with an uncanny intelligence that is not quite human but far more than an animal. You have the following abilities and limitations:
* You can summon or dismiss your spirit with a thought and a gesture, either at your side or at a nearby object of the same element and at least as large as your spirit, so long as your craft is not suppressed.
* You and your spirit experience increasing discomfort as you separate, with it becoming noticeable when on opposite sides of a town and rapidly increasing in intensity beyond that.
* Your spirit cannot speak, but you have an empathetic link to it and know its current mood, status, and approximate location. Additionally, you have a hazy impression of the last hour of its memories. Your spirit experiences this same effect with you.
* When not summoned, your spirit is dispersed into the local elements. While not summoned your spirit shares its awareness with you and you can feel its response to your actions through your empathetic bond.
* You have a natural aptitude when interacting with spirits of the element and animals of a similar category to your spirit.

name: Evade
effect: Gain +1 _Reflex_. Make a _Defense Roll_ and apply the result to the triggering Attack, resolving all effects as if that was the Attack's original effect.

status: Attack is a _Graze_ or gains -1 Rank

name: Interact
effect: Make an _Abbreviated Skill Challenge_ (if required) to resolve an _Interaction_ within Range. Common Interactions are typically a specific Terrain effect, spiritcraft, an objective on the battlefield, or when attempting to demoralize or persuade the enemy.

enhancements.name: High-Effort
enhancements.effect: Gain +1 die on your Skill Challenge. You may repeat this _Enhancement_.

name: Drop
effect: Place the Target in your _Arena_.

enhancements.name: Unstrap
enhancements.effect: Instead, Target is a _Worn_ piece of _Equipment_. You may choose this _Enhance_ in addition to another.

enhancements.name: Handoff
enhancements.effect: Choose a willing ally within _Melee_ _Range_. Instead, they may immediately _Wield_ or _Wear_ the Target.

enhancements.name: Fling
enhancements.effect: Instead, place the Target unused in an adjacent _Arena_.

enhancements.name: Toss
enhancements.effect: The Target must be 1 _Load_ or less. Choose a willing ally within _Range_ 0. They may immediately _Wield_ the Target if they have a _Free Hand_.

name: Equip
effect: Make the Target _Worn_ or _Wielded_, as applicable.

enhancements.name: Retrieve
enhancements.effect: Create an [_Opening_]. Instead, target an _Unattended_ piece of _Equipment_ in your _Arena_ or one _Worn_ or _Wielded_ by a willing Target you are _Engaged_ with.

enhancements.name: Rummage
enhancements.effect: Create an [_Opening_]. Instead, target a _Packed_ Item. Add [_Final_].

name: Swift Recall
effect: _Recall_ your _Spirit_.

name: Combination Strike
effect: Your Spirit may immediately use a Single-Target Attack [_Discount_ 2] against the same Target.

name: Interdiction
effect: You and your Spirit are both targeted by the triggering effect, but take half Damage/_Stun_ each and _Negate_ with _Advantage_.

name: Improvised Attack
effect: Attack a Target within Range, using a _Wielded_ item. Add the most appropriate keywords for damage type  ([_Crush_] if unclear) and material based on the _Wielded_ item. If the item is 0 _Load_, add [_Feeble_].

enhancements.name: Medium Improvised Attack
enhancements.effect: Instead, this uses a 2 _Load_ item. Deal +_1/2/2/3_ Damage. Range is instead _Melee_.

enhancements.name: Heavy Improvised Attack
enhancements.effect: Instead, this uses a 3 _Load_ item. Deal +_2/4/4/6_ Damage. Range is instead _Melee_.

name: Brawl
effect:
Choose one, then Attack a Target within Range:
* <u>Slam:</u> Deal _0/0/1/1_ _Damage_ and _1/1/2/2_ _Stun_.
* <u>Overpower:</u> Inflict _Push_ [_Grit_], _Prone_ [_Grit_/_Reflex_] or _Grabbed_ [_Grit_/_Reflex_].
* <u>Steal:</u> Inflict _Disarm_ [_Grit_/_Reflex_]. The Target has _Advantage_ to _Negate_ if they are _Wielding_ the item.

name: Deflect
effect: Gain +1 _Grit_. Make a _Defense Roll_ and apply the result. If the triggering effect triggers _Sunder_, you may choose the Target instead of the attacker.

name: Encourage
effect: You call encouragement out to an ally. They may clear 3 _Stun_, or 4 if you are in a _Support_ _Stance_.

enhancements.name: Focused Encouragement
enhancements.effect: In addition, that ally gains 1 _Momentum_ or _Guard_.

name: Adrenaline Rush
trigger: None. You may use this _Reaction at any time, but only once per _Round_.
effect: Immediately gain 4 _Momentum_ or _Guard_ (in any combination) and 1 _Fatigue_.

name: Earthen Reconstitution
effect: Gain 3 _Vigor_. If triggering this based on _Equipment_, reduce the _Durability_ of said _Equipment_ by 1.
